description: A React component for managing departments with create and delete functionality, including UI elements and integration with API calls and React Query for data fetching.

methods.name: DepartmentsTable
methods.description: Main React functional component for displaying and managing departments.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Handles creation of a new department and updates the department list.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles deletion of a department and updates the department list.
